briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Increased Dose of TA-650 (Infliximab) in Patients With Crohn's Disease (CD)
officialTitle: Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Increased Dose of TA-650 in Patients With Crohn's Disease (CD)
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy, safety and pharmacokinetics after administration of 10mg/kg TA-650 every 8 weeks to patients with Crohn's disease showing an insufficient response to previous treatment with 5 mg/kg of REMICADE every 8 weeks.

primaryOutcome.measure: Median Crohn's Disease Activity Index (CDAI) Change From Week 0 to Week 8 in the Increased Dose Period
